description: Easement by necessity for landlocked parcel
facts: Bob owns a landlocked parcel with no access to a public road
The only access is across Carol's adjacent property
Both parcels were originally part of a single tract
Bob needs to cross Carol's land to reach the public road
asp_facts: easement_claim(e1). claimant(e1, bob). servient_estate_owner(e1, carol). is_landlocked(e1, yes). common_ownership_history(e1, yes). no_alternative_access(e1, yes). necessity_type(e1, strict).
question: Does Bob have an easement by necessity across Carol's property?
rationale: An easement by necessity is created when a parcel becomes landlocked after division from a common owner. Bob has a legal right to access across Carol's property.
